name: PF Report
query:
SELECT
    te.employee AS Employee_ID,
    te.employee_name AS Employee_Name,
    te.department AS Department,
    te.company AS Company,
    YEAR(tla.from_date) AS Year,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTHNAME(tla.from_date) = 'January' THEN CONCAT('<font color="blue">', IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0), '</font>') ELSE IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0) END) AS January,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTHNAME(tla.from_date) = 'February' THEN CONCAT('<font color="blue">', IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0), '</font>') ELSE IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0) END) AS February,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTHNAME(tla.from_date) = 'March' THEN CONCAT('<font color="blue">', IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0), '</font>') ELSE IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0) END) AS March,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTHNAME(tla.from_date) = 'April' THEN CONCAT('<font color="blue">', IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0), '</font>') ELSE IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0) END) AS April,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTHNAME(tla.from_date) = 'May' THEN CONCAT('<font color="blue">', IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0), '</font>') ELSE IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0) END) AS May,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTHNAME(tla.from_date) = 'June' THEN CONCAT('<font color="blue">', IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0), '</font>') ELSE IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0) END) AS June,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTHNAME(tla.from_date) = 'July' THEN CONCAT('<font color="blue">', IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0), '</font>') ELSE IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0) END) AS July,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTHNAME(tla.from_date) = 'August' THEN CONCAT('<font color="blue">', IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0), '</font>') ELSE IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0) END) AS August,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTHNAME(tla.from_date) = 'September' THEN CONCAT('<font color="blue">', IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0), '</font>') ELSE IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0) END) AS September,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTHNAME(tla.from_date) = 'October' THEN CONCAT('<font color="blue">', IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0), '</font>') ELSE IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0) END) AS October,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTHNAME(tla.from_date) = 'November' THEN CONCAT('<font color="blue">', IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0), '</font>') ELSE IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0) END) AS November,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTHNAME(tla.from_date) = 'December' THEN CONCAT('<font color="blue">', IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0), '</font>') ELSE IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', 1, 0) END) AS December,
    SUM(IF(tla.leave_type = 'EL', CONCAT('<font color="blue">', 1, '</font>'), CONCAT('<font color="black">', 0, '</font>'))) AS Total
FROM
    `tabLeave Application` tla
JOIN
    `tabEmployee` te ON tla.employee = te.employee
WHERE
    YEAR(tla.from_date) >= YEAR(te.date_of_joining) AND YEAR(tla.from_date) <= YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())
GROUP BY
    te.employee,
    YEAR(tla.from_date)
ORDER BY
    Year,
    Employee_ID;
